meta.title: Contact LAB SEVEN | Labrador Field Systems
meta.description: Contact Labrador Field Systems to book LAB SEVEN or for product info. Professional battery power rental support.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.description: Ready to rent LAB SEVEN? Have questions about the system? Want to discuss custom power solutions? We're here to help. Contact Labrador Field Systems for rentals, demos, and product information.

items.title: Rental Bookings
items.description: Contact Labrador Field Systems to check availability, book your rental, or discuss multi-day packages and volume discounts.

items.title: Product Questions
items.description: Reach out to Labrador Field Systems for technical specifications, custom configurations, or partnership opportunities.

items.title: Technical Support
items.description: Active renters receive 24/7 technical support during their rental period. Non-urgent questions answered during business hours.

items.title: Labrador Field Systems
items.description: Primary rental partner for LAB SEVEN battery systems in Los Angeles area. Full-service equipment rental house with delivery, setup, and support. Phone: 310-776-0154 | Email: amit@fieldpack.co

items.title: Rental Booking Process
items.description: Call or email Labrador Field Systems with your shoot dates, location, and power requirements. Mention promo code "241" for one free rental day on first booking. We'll confirm availability and coordinate delivery.

items.title: Demo and Site Visits
items.description: Want to see LAB SEVEN before your rental? We can arrange product demonstrations or site visits for qualified productions. Contact Labrador Field Systems to schedule.

items.title: Custom Power Solutions
items.description: Multi-unit installations, extended productions, festival power, or unique requirements? Contact Labrador directly to discuss custom configurations and support.
